issue.title: [Java] There is no need to consider byte order in ArrowBufHasher
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6264](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6264). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to the discussion in [https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5063#issuecomment-521276547](https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5063#issuecomment-521276547.), Arrow has a mechanism to make sure the data is stored in little-endian, so there is no need to check byte order.
